member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CQP
member.summary: Represents a rate control structure definition for constant quantization parameter mode.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CQP.ConstantQP_FullIntracodedFrame
member.summary: A UINT64 specifying the quantization parameter that should be used for each fully intra-encoded frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CQP.ConstantQP_InterPredictedFrame_PrevRefOnly
member.summary: A UINT64 specifying the quantization parameter that should be used for each encoded frame that has inter-picture references to pictures (in display order) before the current one.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_CQP.ConstantQP_InterPredictedFrame_BiDirectionalRef
member.summary: A UINT64 specifying the quantization parameter that should be used for each encoded frame that has inter-picture references to pictures (in display order) both from previous and next frames.
